ygData.subject: Re: Song tactics in groups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Whatever you do, don t play Chords of Dissonance in a group situation in a dungeon. Personally, I play Anthem and Bellow when partying. Not very exciting,
ygData.messageBody:
> Ethric wrote:
> I'm looking for a
> "whatever you do, don't ever play song "XXX" in a group situation in a
> dungeon!!"

Whatever you do, don't play Chords of Dissonance in a group
situation in a dungeon.

Personally, I play Anthem and Bellow when partying. Not very
exciting, I know, but none of the other songs at my level (13)
inspire me much.
Chant of Battle is only really useful if you use a drum, but
then the party loses a sword. So only an option in a full
group, with several tanks IMHO.
And Chords is too dangerous unless you are very confident about
being able to take on anything that wanders past you and into
the song's range.

Of course, after battle you switch to mandolin and heal. 8)


Rocket
